## blockRendering.Debug.config property

Configuration object containing booleans to enable and disable debug rendering of specific rendering components.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static config: {
        rowSpacers: boolean;
        elemSpacers: boolean;
        rows: boolean;
        elems: boolean;
        connections: boolean;
        blockBounds: boolean;
        connectedBlockBounds: boolean;
        render: boolean;
    };
```
